version_description:
Westland Survival has just been released!

Discover the Wild West and help a cowboy against lawless gunslingers and relentless nature. Westland Survival is our debut game - we especially welcome all feedback and suggestions but also stories about how your rangers are doing :)

Westland Survival has just been released!

Discover the Wild West and help a cowboy against lawless gunslingers and relentless nature. Westland Survival is our debut game - we especially welcome all feedback and suggestions but also stories about how your rangers are doing :)

Discover the Wild West and help a cowboy against lawless gunslingers and relentless nature. Westland Survival is our debut game - we especially welcome all feedback and suggestions but also stories about how your rangers are doing :)

We opened several new locations in the North: 2 rocky areas for Copper and Aluminum ore mining, an Oak Grove and the Indians’ Tribe. Don’t forget to put on warm clothing!
The brand new interface is in too. From now on almost all windows look like we imagined them at the very beginning of the game development - shiny!
Also added was jewelry crafting: Rings and the new Amulets may be crafted from surplus rings you’ve got in the Canyon Trials.

If you missed it, since our release in July, a number of features have been added for all you Wild Western survivors to discover:

• A new event location for newcomers called The Shootout
• A challenging contest for gaining accessories, The Canyon Trials
• Attribute resets for trying out different ways to skill your cowboy
• Daily Login rewards for rewarding the most eager explorers

We opened several new locations in the North: 2 rocky areas for Copper and Aluminum ore mining, an Oak Grove and the Indians’ Tribe. Don’t forget to put on warm clothing!
The brand new interface is in too. From now on almost all windows look like we imagined them at the very beginning of the game development - shiny!
Also added was jewelry crafting: Rings and the new Amulets may be crafted from surplus rings you’ve got in the Canyon Trials.

• A new event location for newcomers called The Shootout
• A challenging contest for gaining accessories, The Canyon Trials
• Attribute resets for trying out different ways to skill your cowboy
• Daily Login rewards for rewarding the most eager explorers

The brand new interface is in too. From now on almost all windows look like we imagined them at the very beginning of the game development - shiny!
Also added was jewelry crafting: Rings and the new Amulets may be crafted from surplus rings you’ve got in the Canyon Trials.
If you missed it, since our release in July, a number of features have been added for all you Wild Western survivors to discover:
• A new event location for newcomers called The Shootout
• A challenging contest for gaining accessories, The Canyon Trials
• Attribute resets for trying out different ways to skill your cowboy
• Daily Login rewards for rewarding the most eager explorers

Let us introduce a new feature: the Bounty Hunt! Help the sheriff, as he doesn’t have the resources to track bandits down alone! To get an outlaw’s name whom you need to capture, build a Bulletin board on your ranch. Track the bad guys and get your rewards when the sheriff pops by your ranch.

The Christmas Season comes to the Wild West!

- Gather toys and materials, and exchange those at the Trader for seasonal clothes and weapons!
- Find the Lair of the Grinch and bring back the star for your festive tree!
- Complete the tree decoration and receive a special gift after the event has ended!

Grinch was caught, all the toys were found and you have saved the Christmas! It means you can receive and open your gifts now!
- All the players who finished the tree decoration will get a special Christmas chest filled with gifts.
- Players, who decorated the tree with at least 10 toys will also get their gifts (a little less, but anyway).
- All the Christmas toys and trees will disappear after the update.

Fixes:
- Frontal attacks of tamed animal won’t deal any accident DMG to allies.

- A Spirit Cave is now opened! A mighty Indian spirit has agreed to let cowboys fight with enemies in the Cave. Be careful, it's a highly dangerous place!
- We have reduced the difficulty of a Shootout event.
- We have added “Store all” and “Sort” buttons in the inventory menu.
- Daily rewards window was updated.
- We have changed the design of some objects icons on the minimap.
- We have also added a pointer which shows the direction to the Deputy Sheriff.

Hotfixes:
- Spirit Cave: Fixed incorrect hardmode level calculation.
- Spirit Cave: Fixed issue when enemies had 0 armor.
- Fixed critical issues.

What’s new:
- The pine forest has been completely redesigned. We've added some interesting events there!
- The damage which has been consumed by armor will be visible during the attack.
- We have added new icons for herbs on the mini-map.
- 9th wave difficulty has been lowered in the Canyon Trials.
- Granite has been replaced by Basalt in the Dried forest.
Fixes:
- Fixed bugs with Bounty Hunters and Bodyguards.

What’s new:
- New resources: Ash tree, Chromite ore, Granite, Fine hide and Linen.
- New locations: Mixed forest, Abandoned mine, Buffalo pasture.
- New repair system. You need special repair kits.
- Some items were removed: Copper and Bronze wire, Copper rivet.
- New Bounty contracts for South and North!
- Workbenches works without Storage.
Fixes:
- Fixed a bug when you could kill a tamed animal in the Spirit cave.
- Fixed a bug when some players displayed white in the Town.

What’s new:
- From now on Ash, Granite, Chromite ore and Linen can be found in the Southern locations.
- Upgrade interface of storages and workshops was improved. You will see the current status of upgrading a workbench or storage directly on the object.
- Bandits’ bodies will disappear in 1 hour after the invasion is over. You won’t miss the Bandits’ stash map ever!
- After the first authorization via Game Center, your character will get a corresponding name.
- A few slight changes in several recipes and resources drop rate (corn seeds will drop more often, the required berries amount for the steak was cut).
- Life in the Dried forest has changed a bit. Creatures have left the place. Outlaws arrived and decided to stay there for a while. Good news: you don’t need a horse anymore for visiting the forest.
- Southern locations have been changed as well. Terribly insolent and rude marauders have come there. Some of the mystical creatures have left the area.
- Chains will be replaced by Bronze ingots as they are no longer needed in crafting recipes.
- Town traders got new looks. Check them out!
- Improved bow got a new icon and model (earlier it looked like a bow from the Spirit cave).
- We've added a notifying window in case if the device doesn't meet the requirements.

Fixes:
- Fixed incorrect resources display in the description of the Abandoned Mine.
- Fixed a bug when tamed animals didn't defend a cowboy from their own fellows.
- Fixed a bug when enemy players stood inactive.
- Fixed a bug with a snitch when he refused to give you information about the Bandits’ hideout.

- The Town got several visual and gameplay changes. It became more dynamic as we have added more citizens.
- Southern Traders changed their recipes according to the Westland market. They would be happy to get planks and iron ingots in exchange for rare resources. Recipes reset once a day.
- If you didn’t get enough buckets of tar, Christoph will offer you more if you finished Leroy’s quests.
- We have fixed the issue when players couldn’t finish the Magic Trinket quest. Leroy Samson will now accept any amulet with +5 bonus or higher.

- From now on rare Medicative Herbs can be found in the Northern region.
- New feature: Zoom. You can Zoom In and Out in the Building or Invasion results mode.
- Defensive structures on your ranch don't deal damage to your Cowboy anymore. Your ranch - your rules!
- Wooden stakes on your neighbors' ranches can be destroyed with the axe.
- We've improved Shop visual effects.

What’s new:

Renewed shop and storage menu interface.
Several visual changes in 3rd and 4th Spirit Cave rooms. Also, we have added special markers for improved navigation.
A “Tome of retraining” will be a separate item which you can store in your backpack or storage.
The order of room which you can open in the Spirit Cave have been corrected. From now on, the sequence of doors you can open is not important, you can freely choose which room to explore first or last.
Special offers were added in the shop.
We added exit doors in rooms, so you won’t get lost in the dark.
Bosses and mini-bosses will now have special icons on the minimap.
Adjusted characteristics balance. We have recalculated the existing characteristics of all creatures and characters. You will probably notice that your cowboy's health, the "Healing" indicator or the damage has doubled, as well as the damage and health of enemies.
Renewed the Canyon Trials reward window.
Fixed bugs:

Fixed a bug showing the totem’s display of attempts left to tame animals incorrectly.
Fixed bugs with stuck animals and your cowboy in the cave.
Fixed a bug in the shop menu when you couldn't see the moment if somebody attacked a cowboy.

What's New:
- We have prepared something new: Bandit’s Attack! By killing members of the gang you increase the Bandit's Anger. As soon as Anger reaches the maximum your ranch will be attacked. Defend your ranch and all the supplies or prepare Silver Coins to buy your way out!
- New event: Bandit's Stash. You have to find the location of bandit's loot stash if you are going to hit back.
- New buildings: now you can build up the ranch with Iron stakes, Traps or Sandbags.
- Destroyed furniture (for example, a Foundry) can be repaired. You need just a few seconds.
- We have adjusted a Spirit Cave rewards.

Fixes:
- Fixed the problem when several events appear at the same location on the global map.
- Fixed a bug with the Smugglers’ marker on the minimap in the northern area.
- Fixed the Canyon Trials issue, when some players could get stuck there.
- Fixed a bug with text display in the bug report window.

What's New:
- We have prepared something new: Bandit’s Attack! By killing members of the gang you increase the Bandit's Anger. As soon as Anger reaches the maximum your ranch will be attacked. Defend your ranch and all the supplies or prepare Silver Coins to buy your way out!
- New event: Bandit's Stash. You have to find the location of bandit's loot stash if you are going to hit back.
- New buildings: now you can build up the ranch with Iron stakes, Traps or Sandbags.
- Destroyed furniture (for example, a Foundry) can be repaired. You need just a few seconds.
- We have adjusted a Spirit Cave rewards.

Fixes:
- Fixed the problem when several events appear at the same location on the global map.
- Fixed a bug with the Smugglers’ marker on the minimap in the northern area.
- Fixed the Canyon Trials issue, when some players could get stuck there.
- Fixed a bug with text display in the bug report window.

- From now on rare Medicative Herbs can be found in the Northern region.
- New feature: Zoom. You can Zoom In and Out in the Building or Invasion results mode.
- Defensive structures on your ranch don't deal damage to your Cowboy anymore. Your ranch - your rules!
- Wooden stakes on your neighbors' ranches can be destroyed with the axe.
- We've improved Shop visual effects.

- New types of the Bandits’ Hideout locations were added.
- Bandits’ speed on the ranch during the raid was reduced.
- You don’t need resources to fix destroyed walls anymore.
- We have added a fog on the global map to hide all closed location. However, several locations are still visible ;)

- We have opened the TOWN!
- Wayland will be glad to fix your broken equipment if you share with him his favorite food
- Sheriff Schultz got his own office in the town.
- There is a snitch that can help you to track down the bandit’s hideout location for a fee.
- Bridge will open several locations to explore: Neighbor’s ranch, Oak Grove, Maple forest and Trader’s house.
- From now on the Rings and Amulets which you put on the cowboy won’t disappear in case of a death.

- The Town got several visual and gameplay changes. It became more dynamic as we have added more citizens.
- Southern Traders changed their recipes according to the Westland market. They would be happy to get planks and iron ingots in exchange for rare resources. Recipes reset once a day.
- If you didn’t get enough buckets of tar, Christoph will offer you more if you finished Leroy’s quests.
- We have fixed the issue when players couldn’t finish the Magic Trinket quest. Leroy Samson will now accept any amulet with +5 bonus or higher.

ATTENTION! Many items and buildings on the ranch have been changed! Many workbenches was removed. Stall's recipe and other collections have been changed. ALL RESOURCES REQUIRED FOR CONSTRUCTION AND COMPENSATION WERE DELIVERED TO GAME STORAGE.

- Most recipes have been modified.
- For the construction is available a new type of building – storage.
- The resources that are stored in the storage are used to produce items on the workbenches.

- New Traders — new recipes! Don’t miss a chance to check our bartender in the Saloon.
- Canyon Trials and Spirit Cave were balanced considering the new craft-menu and latest game changes.
- Angry bandits came back in Westland. Don’t forget to build defense facilities on the ranch in order to save your supplies.
- Fuel and Fuel Storage were removed from the game. Coal and logs will be displayed as a necessary resource to produce items.
- We have cut energy consumption for the “Run” mode.
- We have changed the position of “Dried forest” according to its new difficulty.
- The number of waves in the Canyon Trials was increased to 25. Old waves were changed, new enemies were added.
- More enemies and chests have been added into the 4th room.
- To get to the Boss you’ll have to kill at least one mini-boss (Piasa or Dsonokva).
- Fixed a bug when canceling repair process gave full durability scale for the item.
- Fixed a bug when damage and hit were not synced.

What’s new:
- New resources: Ash tree, Chromite ore, Granite, Fine hide and Linen.
- New locations: Mixed forest, Abandoned mine, Buffalo pasture.
- New repair system. You need special repair kits.
- Some items were removed: Copper and Bronze wire, Copper rivet.
- New Bounty contracts for South and North!
- Workbenches works without Storage.
Fixes:
- Fixed a bug when you could kill a tamed animal in the Spirit cave.
- Fixed a bug when some players displayed white in the Town.

What’s new:
- From now on Ash, Granite, Chromite ore and Linen can be found in the Southern locations.
- Upgrade interface of storages and workshops was improved. You will see the current status of upgrading a workbench or storage directly on the object.
- Bandits’ bodies will disappear in 1 hour after the invasion is over. You won’t miss the Bandits’ stash map ever!
- After the first authorization via Game Center, your character will get a corresponding name.
- A few slight changes in several recipes and resources drop rate (corn seeds will drop more often, the required berries amount for the steak was cut).
- Life in the Dried forest has changed a bit. Creatures have left the place. Outlaws arrived and decided to stay there for a while. Good news: you don’t need a horse anymore for visiting the forest.
- Southern locations have been changed as well. Terribly insolent and rude marauders have come there. Some of the mystical creatures have left the area.
- Chains will be replaced by Bronze ingots as they are no longer needed in crafting recipes.
- Town traders got new looks. Check them out!
- Improved bow got a new icon and model (earlier it looked like a bow from the Spirit cave).
- We've added a notifying window in case if the device doesn't meet the requirements.

Fixes:
- Fixed incorrect resources display in the description of the Abandoned Mine.
- Fixed a bug when tamed animals didn't defend a cowboy from their own fellows.
- Fixed a bug when enemy players stood inactive.
- Fixed a bug with a snitch when he refused to give you information about the Bandits’ hideout.

What's new:
- The customization feature is released!
- Outlaws' camp which is near the Blocked snowy passage will be replaced by "Outlaws' stopover". In case if you have been in the Outlaws’ camp before the update and kept your supplies in the chests, you have 7 days to move them back at your ranch. 7 days count will start from the first location visit.
- We've added Xbox и DualShoсk controllers' support.
- We've added a VIP status.
- Leather and armored black set appearance has been changed.

What’s new:
- The pine forest has been completely redesigned. We've added some interesting events there!
- The damage which has been consumed by armor will be visible during the attack.
- We have added new icons for herbs on the mini-map.
- 9th wave difficulty has been lowered in the Canyon Trials.
- Granite has been replaced by Basalt in the Dried forest.
Fixes:
- Fixed bugs with Bounty Hunters and Bodyguards.

Unfortunately with this Westland update, we are forced to end support for all Apple devices running iOS versions lower than iOS 13. If your device is running on an iOS version of 12 or lower, you will no longer be able to play Westland unless you update to the latest iOS version. Please update to iOS version 13 (or higher) if you want to continue playing.

Christmas cheer:

The festive event has started and opened for you until 7 January!

We have decorated your ranch and town and added a little snow. Don’t worry, your character won’t freeze.

3 Santa’s helpers decided to stop by and camped in the Christmas spot. Help Arnold, Jeina, and Mark and make this celebration unforgettable!

A sneaky green villain has stolen the Christmas spirit again. Track him down, bring back stolen gifts and find a Christmas star for the tree!

Decorating a Christmas tree is always fun. Complete Christmas quests, find tree toys in special boxes scattered throughout the locations and finish your festive tree.



Recipes and blueprints:

From now on the items will have a rarity. There are common, uncommon (green) and rare (blue) items. The rarer the item, the better characteristics it has.
We also have added blueprints. Blueprints can be found in the tubes and you can find them almost in any location.

Blueprints level. Learning blueprints, which by the way have rarity as well, will open new recipes or level-up the existing ones. The maximum level is 5.

We have added a bunch of new weapons and clothing. To open their recipes, you need to get a blueprint.

Rare items have unique stats: critical hit chance, critical hit damage, increasing stealth, damage over time, slowing enemies, armor ignoring.

Items description has been changed as well. You can find more information there.


Changes and improvements:

The equipped torch will warm the character.
To activate a bonfire in the Northern locations you no longer need logs, just light it up with the torch.

The button “Repair all” has been moved to the main screen.

Character’s health has been increased. Each level you will get 10 points of health.

Bandages, infusions, and ointments will restore more health.

Enemies' health has been changed.

Adjusted the damage of walls and chests dealt with an ax.


Fixes:

Fixed a bug when tamed animals attacked each other,
Fixed annoying bug with falling into the green screen.

Other minor but worthy fixes.

What's new:
- The festive event is opened until 7 January!
- 3 Santa’s helpers decided to stop by in the Christmas spot. Help them to defeat Grinch!
- Complete Christmas quests, find toys in special boxes scattered throughout the locations and finish your festive tree.
- The items have a rarity. The rarer the item, the better characteristics it has.
- New: blueprints. It can be found in the tubes and you can find them almost in any location.
- Added a bunch of new weapons and clothing.

What’s new:
- The festive event is over and you can claim Christmas presents! If you have finished decorating the tree, you will get a unique box full of rewards. If your tree was decorated at least half, you will also be rewarded.
- All toys, decorations, and snow will disappear. It's time to move on!
Fixes:
- Minor localization fixes.

- Neighbors' raids. From now on you are free to raid other bases! Old bases will disappear in 7 days after the update.
- Pinery, Oak forest, Snowy maple forest, Ash grove, and Maple forest have been completely redesigned.
- New event - Emergency stop. Robbers attacked the train and took civilians as hostages. Help them out and stop the outlaws!
- Abandoned mine will look like a set of tunnels with enemies and various scenarios.
- Spirit Cave weapons and clothing got its own rarity.

Fixed a bug when storage or workbenches might disappear after being upgraded.

Fixed a bug with an incorrect display of a landscape on locations with rivers.

Fixed an issue with a bug report on a loading screen.

Fixed a bug when a customization menu got freeze up.

Fixed a bug with items drag-and-drop.

You will no longer lose all your equipment if the character died! However, you will lose 5% of the experience, weapons and armor will lose 40% of durability.

From now on a Northern Outlaw's camp is going to be a Northern Outlaws' stopover.

Once you open a tube, a blueprint will be instantly learned, easy-peasy. All unused blueprints will be replaced by a relevant tube.

Grindstone, copper rivets and wire will no longer drop.

Armor durability has been increased.

You will no longer lose all your equipment if the character died! However, you will lose 5% of the experience, weapons and armor will lose 40% of durability.

From now on a Northern Outlaw's camp is going to be a Northern Outlaws' stopover.

Once you open a tube, a blueprint will be instantly learned, easy-peasy. All unused blueprints will be replaced by a relevant tube.

Grindstone, copper rivets and wire will no longer drop.

Armor durability has been increased.

Hunting! You'll find Old Nick at your ranch. Once you finish his first quest, he'll be in the saloon.

Dovecote. From now on you'll receive all the news.

Decreased character's health after death.

Grindstones and Leather belts will no longer drop, we replaced it by Iron bars and Leather.

A free common tube is available once a day, uncommon one - once a week. You can get it by watching the ads.

Bows crafting was shifted to the carpenter table, stone hammer - to the stone cutter.

Hunting! You'll find Old Nick at your ranch. Once you finish his first quest, he'll be in the saloon.

Dovecote. From now on you'll receive all the news.

Decreased character's health and gear breaking after death.

Grindstones and Leather belts will no longer drop, we replaced it by Iron bars and Leather.

A free common tube is available once a day, uncommon one - once a week. You can get it by watching the ads.

Bows crafting was shifted to the carpenter table, stone hammer - to the stone cutter.

What's new:

● You will be able to get axles and wheels to complete the wagon!

● We have added more mini-events at the Stone plateau.

● From now on you can get tools from the town traders.

● The description of Canyon Trials rewards has been changed.

● The balance of some waves in the Canyon has been adjusted.

● Repair time has been increased depending on the bench level.

● Each repair bench upgrade significantly increases the repair speed.

● Outlaws' stopover timer will appear once you enter the location. Previously the timer showed up upon the Gang leader's death.

● The spawn point in the Town has been changed.

● Safes have been replaced with huge antique chests with the same capacity. This applies only to our veteran players. Note, that these chests can be destroyed by the bandits, so keep an eye on it!

● We got your feedback regarding the energy which is why your energy recovery speed will be 1,5 times faster. It's time to travel!

Wagon:

● All required for the wagon building resources are now available in the game! You'll have to complete various tasks to collect all the details, so get ready.

● The wagon allows you to move around the map, carry locked safes and supplies. Allison is a Safecracker, he can help you to break into safes.

● The wagon recipe has been changed. We have added 2 more details - reins and bows.

● Norris will help you to get reins and the trader Christoph Rush will help you with bows.

● Other wagon details can be found in a Shootout spot if you have already built a stable.

● You can upgrade the Wagon in order to get more space.

● You can also leave the wagon at any location and get back later.

Fixes:

● Neighbors' bases won't be similar each time they appear on the map.

● Fixed a bug with freezing animation of the recipes in particular circumstances.

● Fixed a bug when equipped weapon disappears from the hand slot.

● Fixed a bug when your character might ignore enemies in auto mode.

● Fixed a bug when cowboys' fight on the Stone plateau displayed incorrectly.

What's new:
- A new trader appeared in the Town. He will offer you to exchange horse equipment and parts for the wagon.
- Christopher Rush was moved closer to the player's spawn up North.

Fixes:
- Fixed an issue when the game sounds were still on while watching the video ads.

What's new:
- A new trader appeared in the Town. He will offer you to exchange horse equipment and parts for the wagon.
- Christopher Rush was moved closer to the player's spawn up North.

Fixes:
- Fixed an issue when the game sounds were still on while watching the video ads.

Big Summer Update:
Meet the Storyline! — Complete the 1st chapter of the Storyline campaign. 10+ quests of thrilling Wild West adventures await! Talk with Molly at your ranch to start the Storyline.
Crafting Madness! — Craft powerful tier 5 items with new tier 5 resources. Explore 10+ new items and delicious dishes.
Upgrade ranch to max! — Boost your ranch production by fully upgrading all workshops to tier 5. All 6 basic workshops are now fully upgradeable too.

2 years in Saddle! — Complete special anniversary quest to get rewards and celebrate 2nd Westland’s Survival birthday with us!
Shopping time! — Town merchants have noticeably expanded their product range. Now you can buy not only raw materials but even some supplies! Check out our «Town Guide» on Facebook for more info.
Sheriff Outfit Reworked! — Rare Sheriff Outfit was returned to the game and its visuals were improved. Show outlaws a formidable look of the Law!

More ways to find tier 5! — Valuable tier 5 resources can now be found in some Southern locations and also during the «Emergency stop» event for players at 80+ level.
Play comfy! — After a series of big updates, we decided to make a summer sweep-up patch. You will find a bunch of UI improvements, polishing moments, and fixes for smoother playing experience.
New localizations! — Czech and Indonesian localizations were added to the game.

More quests every day! — The Bulletin Board has been improved and now you can find up to 3 new quests every day. Adventures await!

Bounty Hunt has been improved! —
Meet the unique Bandits’ Hideouts! Each Bandits’ Hideout is now uniquely generated. It will make Bounty Hunt quests more challenging and diverse. Also, new difficulty levels have been added, and, from now on, experienced cowboys may expect to get valuable tier 4+ loot.

Gunfighter's set! — Try out a new stylish tier 5 outfit.

Bounty Hunt hotfix update:
— More valuable & variable loot and rewards, including tier 5 items for level 80+ players.
— Bandits will store more valuable resources in their Hideouts.
— Better loot for killing the Bandit leader.
— Finding map pieces became easier.
— The quest journal was improved.
— No more quests in yet locked areas.
— Other long-awaited Bounty Hunt fixes.

Thank you all for your feedback! We hope you will enjoy the changes.
Find out more on our Facebook page.

— Hunting Season is open! — Challenge yourself in 25+ new hunting quests.

— Smuggler's rarities! — Smuggler has received a special delivery, and now you can find rare tier 4 and 5 items in his store.

— Chat feature! — Share your best cowboy stories in the new in-game chat.

— Bear Armor! — Find recipes for a new rare Bear armor! It also has a special bonus to HP.

— Blasting works! — Walls, doors, and windows now require a different amount of dynamite.

Big Autumn Update:
— Halloween event! — It's spooky fun time: complete a special thrilling storyline, craft 15+ thematic armors & weapons, and decorate your ranch!
— Leaderboards! — Compete with other players and win cool rewards!
— New backpacks! — Craft 15 new capacious backpacks with up to 2 pockets!
— 30+ new quests! — Check the Bulletin board or surroundings for new adventures!

Autumn Polishing Update:
— Thanksgiving event! — It’s time for a turkey hunt! Join the celebrations and take part in the festive questline from 25/11 to 02/12.
— New Fuel Storage — Get ready for the first colds by building a new Fuel Storage at your ranch.
— Store more stuff! — The max number of ranch chests has been increased to 11.
— Ring Reroll becomes cheaper! — The cost of ring reroll in Canyon Trials now depends on the ring’s power.
— Reach level 101 — Max player level has been increased.
— Square & Practical — All workbenches are 1x1 now.
— Bunch of small, but helpful gameplay improvements!

Big Holiday Update
— Jingle all the West! — Save the holiday and take part in the major winter event from Dec 17 to Jan 5.
— New Canyon Trials! — Challenge yourself in the improved Canyon with infinite waves and mini-bosses!
— Storyline: Chapter 2 — Help in sister’s search comes from an unexpected side!
— Level up to 102! — Reach the new 102 level.
— The Armor system has been improved — High-level armor becomes more durable. In most cases, your armor will last longer! Learn more on Facebook.

Minor Update:
— New Trinkets Storage — Clean up the mess at your ranch! Store all trinkets in one place.
— Daily Quests & Canyon Trials Rebalance — The amount of exp for completing Daily Quests has been reduced, rewards in Canyon Trials have been increased!
— New Leaderboard: Canyon Trials!
— Fixing the Bridge became easier — The number of nails required to repair was reduced by 2 times!
— Level 103 — Max player level has been increased.
— List of other small, but essential game improvements. Find out more on Facebook.

— New Feature: Workbench Gear — Improve your ranch production by adding some new features to workbenches!
— New locations: Lakes — Lush green meadows are the best place to hunt and explore the vast variety of Westland’s fauna!
— New animal — Bighorn sheep
— Fauna rebalance — Stronger animals. Better trophies. Improved behavior. Time to hunt!
— 1x1 Storages — All storages are compact now. Design the ranch of your dream!
— Level 104 — Max player level has been increased.
